code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5002/api/auth';export const signup=async data=>{return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/signup"),data);};export const login=async data=>{return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),data);};export const logout=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/logout"),{},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
